rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究证实怀孕期间接种 COVID-19 疫苗对于婴儿神经发育是安全的《JAMA 儿科学》中的一项大型队列研究发现，在子宫内接种过 COVID-19 疫苗的婴儿与未接种过 COVID-19 疫苗的婴儿之间的神经发育率没有显着差异，证实了孕产妇接种 COVID-19 疫苗的安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-confirms-safety-of-COVID-19-vaccination-during-pregnancy-for-infant-neurodevelopment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-confirms-safety-of-COVID-19-vaccination-during-pregnancy-for-infant-neurodevelopment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=928f1b00-2d03-4de2-ae53-594c4c777e62 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 23:16:00 -0500 Study confirms safety of COVID-19 vaccination during pregnancy for infant neurodevelopment
研究显示基因疗法治疗先天性耳聋的有效性由麻省总医院布里格姆分校成员 Mass Eye and Ear 的研究人员共同领导的一项新研究证明了基因疗法对于恢复患有遗传性耳聋的儿童的听力功能的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-shows-effectness-of-gene-therapy-in-treating-congenital-deafness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-shows-effectness-of-gene-therapy-in-treating-congenital-deafness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44d660e4-61b3-411f-acfd-6823a06e8930 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 23:08:17 -0500 Study shows effectiveness of gene therapy in treating congenital deafness
平衡功效和安全性：现代医学中 mRNA 药物和疫苗的挑战研究人员分析了 mRNA 疗法的毒性问题和进展，重点关注其细胞毒性、反应原性和分布，并讨论了 mRNA 研究的挑战和益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Balancing-efficacy-and-safety-The-challenges-of-mRNA-drugs-and-vaccines-in-modern-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Balancing-efficacy-and-safety-The-challenges-of-mRNA-drugs-and-vaccines-in-modern-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=380a39e6-9582-4e1b-a3b2-7de545e21127 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 22:57:00 -0500 Balancing efficacy and safety: The challenges of mRNA drugs and vaccines in modern medicine
Penn 分析显示 CAR T 细胞治疗后继发性癌症的风险较低宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的研究人员今天在《自然医学》杂志上报道，对 Penn Medicine 400 多名接受治疗的患者进行的分析发现，CAR T 细胞疗法后出现任何类型的第二种癌症的情况都很罕见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Penn-analysis-shows-low-risk-of-secondary-cancers-following-CAR-T-cell-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Penn-analysis-shows-low-risk-of-secondary-cancers-following-CAR-T-cell-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baf6af00-c913-4647-9d4c-54afaec2ad4d Wed, 24 Jan 2024 22:51:51 -0500 Penn analysis shows low risk of secondary cancers following CAR T cell therapy
新研究揭示了治疗后艾滋病病毒反弹的关键组织德克萨斯生物医学研究所（Texas Biomed）的研究人员对非人类灵长类病毒进行基因测序，发现腹部淋巴结是艾滋病病毒感染后反弹的主要来源，这对潜在的新艾滋病疗法具有重要意义。停止抗逆转录病毒治疗的第一周。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/New-study-reveals-key-tissues-involved-in-HIV-rebound-after-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/New-study-reveals-key-tissues-involved-in-HIV-rebound-after-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=add6aef4-194a-4123-9ed5-b79c4841954c Wed, 24 Jan 2024 22:37:36 -0500 New study reveals key tissues involved in HIV rebound after treatment
NHS 健康检查与降低心脏、大脑、肾脏和肝脏疾病的风险有关一项分析英国生物银行数据的研究发现，与未参加评估的人相比，接受 NHS 健康评估的个人患各种疾病和死亡的长期风险较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/NHS-health-checks-linked-to-reduced-risk-of-heart-brain-kidney-and-liver-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/NHS-health-checks-linked-to-reduced-risk-of-heart-brain-kidney-and-liver-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=528ff685-0e89-47e5-a8f8-2d94a780d7b7 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 22:25:00 -0500 NHS health checks linked to reduced risk of heart, brain, kidney, and liver diseases
甘草摄入量会使血压升高超出预期，挑战安全限量指南《美国临床营养学杂志》上的一项研究表明，每天食用含有 100 毫克甘草酸的甘草会增加年轻人的血压并抑制醛固酮和肾素水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Licorice-intake-raises-blood-Pressure-more-than-expected-challenges-safe-limit-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Licorice-intake-raises-blood-Pressure-more-than-expected-challenges-safe-limit-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c312ef3a-5cd1-4e0c-a044-6463b762d627 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 22:09:00 -0500 Licorice intake raises blood pressure more than expected, challenges safe limit guidelines
深度学习模型 COMPOSER 增强脓毒症早期检测和患者生存率Npj Digital Medicine 的研究评估了 COMPOSER（一种用于早期脓毒症预测的深度学习模型），显示了其在改善患者护理和降低院内死亡率方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Deep-learning-model-COMPOSER-enhances-early-sepsis-detection-and-病人-survival.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Deep-learning-model-COMPOSER-enhances-early-sepsis-detection-and-病人-survival.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b40c8e2b-04b7-4283-98cd-cd8e5b390c72 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 21:52:00 -0500 Deep learning model COMPOSER enhances early sepsis detection and patient survival
猕猴桃在短短四天内即可改善活力和情绪猕猴桃已证明自己是一种强大的情绪助推器，奥塔哥大学的新研究表明其效果有多快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Kiwifruit-improves-vitality-and-mood-in-as-little-as-four-days.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Kiwifruit-improves-vitality-and-mood-in-as-little-as-four-days.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce3e7b97-c9bb-415a-8dc3-0f16f195d7a1 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 21:42:00 -0500 Kiwifruit improves vitality and mood in as little as four days
研究寻找更准确预测偏头痛发作时间的方法偏头痛常常得不到充分诊断和治疗，即使得到治疗，也很难及早治疗并找到预防发作的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-looks-at-ways-to-more-accurately-predict-when-migraine-attack-will-occur.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240124/Study-looks-at-ways-to-more-accurately-predict-when-migraine-attack-will-occur.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=184ae327-9b33-4853-81eb-203259de2437 Wed, 24 Jan 2024 21:33:35 -0500 Study looks at ways to more accurately predict when migraine attack will occur
